name: COSMONAUT (itch) (Lucas Lima)
description:
Cosmonaut is an experimental exploratory experience currently in development.

Controls:

- 1, 2, 3 to change views

- F to return/exit the pod

- W, A, S, D to move

Use of Keijiro's image effects, including Binary, Isoline, Bloom, Video Bloom, Fringe, Vignette and Color Suit.
